mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_ID AS projectId, PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, LAST_CHNG_ID AS lastChngId, EVA_START_DT AS evaStartDt, EVA_CD AS evaCd FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT WHERE LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(PROJECT_ID, 4) AS PRO_NUM)) IS NULL THEN 'PRO0001' ELSE CONCAT('PRO', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(PROJECT_ID, 4) AS INTEGER)) + 1 AS VARCHAR, 4, '0')) END FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_ID LIKE 'PRO%'
INSERT INTO SCH_INCH.PROJECT (PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, EVA_CD, SCORE_FIN, PROJECT_DETAIL, URL, EVA_START_DT, EVA_END_DT, DEL_YN, FRST_RGSR_ID, FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, LAST_CHNG_ID, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{projectName}, 'A', NULL, NOW(), NULL, #{userGroupId}, NULL, #{projectDetail}, #{url}, 'N', #{userEmail}, NOW(), #{userEmail}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE SCH_INCU.PROJECT SET PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName}, PROJECT_DETAIL = #{projectDetail}, URL = #{url}, LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail}, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = NOW() WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE SCH_INCU.PROJECT SET DEL_YN = 'Y', LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail}, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = NOW() WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_ID AS projectId, PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, EVA_CD AS evaCd, SCORE_FIN AS scoreFin, EVA_START_DT AS evaStartDt, EVA_END_DT AS evaEndDt, USER_GROUP_ID AS userGroupId, EVA_GROUP_ID AS evaGroupId, PROJECT_DETAIL AS projectDetail, URL AS url, DEL_YN AS delYn, FRST_RGSR_ID AS frstRgsrId, FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM AS frstRgsrDtlDttm, LAST_CHNG_ID AS lastChngId, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM AS lastChngDtlDttm FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
